item.title: Q2 FY2026 Earnings Review: Mixed Results Amid Sectoral Divergence and Market Cap Variations
item.description: The September 2025 quarter earnings season has revealed a nuanced picture across Indian equities, with 4,044 companies reporting results. While the overall proportion of positive earnings outcomes remains subdued at 42.0%, mid-cap stocks continue to outperform, delivering a robust 50.0% positive result rate. Large caps lag slightly behind at 39.0%, reflecting ongoing sectoral challenges and selective earnings beats. Time: 2 hours ago

item.title: Aditya Birla Sun Life AMC Ltd Forms Death Cross, Signalling Potential Bearish Trend
item.description: Aditya Birla Sun Life AMC Ltd has recently formed a Death Cross, a significant technical indicator where the 50-day moving average crosses below the 200-day moving average. This development signals a potential shift towards a bearish trend, reflecting deteriorating momentum and raising concerns about the stock's long-term strength within the capital markets sector. Time: 5 hours ago
